data.what_is: Aquent is a workforce services company, operating the world's largest marketing and creative staffing firm that has been providing comprehensive benefits to its talent since 1993. Founded in a dorm room in 1986, Aquent now employs 10,000 people each year across eight countries. Aquent's other business units include Aquent Studios, Vitamin T, Scout, RoboHead, and Gymnasium.
data.product_description: Aquent is a platform that provide a contract and contract-to-hire staffing services allow companies to add technical expertise to their marketing and creative departments, as well as increase the bandwidth of their in-house teams.

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Aquent helped with:
The team (shout out to Amaraj and Charlotte) at Aquent were absolutely amazing! After getting in contact with them on a Tuesday, they had arranged four interviews for me within 24 hours. All the companies I interviewed with aligned with what I wanted in a company.

Amaraj was available throughout the process, including switching my visa (which was a highly complex process). Whether it was early morning or late night, Amaraj was there to put me at ease and lead me on the path to success.

If your're looking for a role in PR, you will 100% find your ideal role with the help of Aquent.

What do you like best about Aquent?
How friendly Amaraj was - everytime I spoke to her, it was like speaking to a close friend.

What do you dislike about Aquent?
The team is lovely! They make the whole process easy.

What problems is Aquent solving and how is that benefiting you?
N/A

initial_reviews.review_title: Aquent has been a great addition to our MarTech stack for project management
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Aquent helped with:
We started it for our creative team, to manage their projects but have since added other teams to the platform. It's now how we manage projects and program tied to campaigns, data, social media, web, technology and others.

What do you like best about Aquent?
It's versatile and able to adapt to our needs.

What do you dislike about Aquent?
Doesn't integrate out of the box with any of our other platforms (Adobe InDesign) or have a robust editorial calendar feature for building out social media posts and tracking measurement, etc.

What problems is Aquent solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking projects, tasks, reviews and overall work loads across multiple marketing teams.

initial_reviews.review_title: I used them to hire product and UI/UX candidates
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Aquent helped with:
Helped with hiring a product manager and UI/UX candidate.

What do you like best about Aquent?
The candidates I got from them were very qualified for the positions I had especially in a very tight market.

What do you dislike about Aquent?
The candidates were very expensive and often out of our budget even thought budget had been discussed.

Recommendations to others considering Aquent:
Be clear on what you want and the budget you have to work with; otherwise you'll get candidates that may be great but are MORE than what you really need.
